description: Catalog of WildFly 36.0.1.Final features (incomplete for now) to provision a WildFly server

legend.layer: The Galleon layer name to use to provision the feature.
legend.description: The textual description of the layer.
legend.stability: One of default, community, preview and experimental. community and default stability features are available by default.
legend.note: To highlight a particularity that occurs when provisioning this layer.
legend.glowDiscoverable: WildFly Glow (CLI or support in the WildFly Maven Plugin), can discover the layer from the API used in your deployment. If false, it must be added using the WildFly Glow addOn name.
legend.glowAddOn: The name of the WildFly Glow addOn to use to provision this functionality when using Wildfly Glow.
legend.glowRules: The list of rules that WildFly Glow uses to discover that your deployment requires this layer (API in use, expected XML descriptor, ...).
legend.feature-pack: The Galleon feature-pack that defines the layer.
legend.managementModel: The part of the management model this layer brings to the server configuration. Can be empty if this layer only aggregates some layers.
legend.dependencies: The list of layers this layer depends on. Those layers are also provisioned when this layer is provisioned.

functionalities.name: ai
functionalities.description: Support for Langchain4j

functionalities.name: gemini-chat-model
functionalities.description: Support for Gemini chat model

functionalities.name: github-chat-model
functionalities.description: Support for GitHub chat model

functionalities.name: mistral-ai-chat-model
functionalities.description: Support for Mistral AI chat model

functionalities.name: neo4j-content-retriever
functionalities.description: Support for neo4j content retriever

functionalities.name: ollama-chat-model
functionalities.description: Support for Ollama chat model

functionalities.name: cloud-server
functionalities.description: An extension of jaxrs-server to address common cloud requirements.

functionalities.name: datasources-web-server
functionalities.description: A servlet container with support for datasources

functionalities.name: ee-core-profile-server
functionalities.description: A Jakarta EE Core Profile server

functionalities.name: jaxrs-server
functionalities.description: An extension of 'datasources-web-server' with support for Jakarta RESTful Web Services, CDI and JPA.

functionalities.name: ejb-dist-cache
functionalities.description: Infinispan-based distributed cache for stateful session beans.
functionalities.note: ejb-local-cache layer must be explicitly excluded if ejb-dist-cache is in use.

functionalities.name: jpa-distributed
functionalities.description: Support for JPA with a distributed second level cache.
functionalities.note: jpa layer must be explicitly excluded if jpa-distributed is in use.

functionalities.name: batch-jberet
functionalities.description: Support for Jakarta Batch

functionalities.name: bean-validation
functionalities.description: Support for Jakarta Bean Validation

functionalities.name: cdi
functionalities.description: Support for Jakarta Contexts and Dependency Injection

functionalities.name: ee-concurrency
functionalities.description: Support for Jakarta EE Concurrency

functionalities.name: ejb
functionalities.description: Support for Jakarta Enterprise Beans, excluding the IIOP protocol

functionalities.name: ejb-http-invoker
functionalities.description: Support for invoking Jakarta Enterprise Beans over HTTP

functionalities.name: ejb-lite
functionalities.description: Support for Jakarta Enterprise Beans Lite

functionalities.name: ejb-local-cache
functionalities.description: Infinispan-based local cache for stateful session beans.
functionalities.note: This layer must be explicitly excluded if ejb-dist-cache is in use.

functionalities.name: jaxrs
functionalities.description: Support for Jakarta RESTful Web Services with optional ee-concurrency and deployment scanner layers.

functionalities.name: jaxrs-core
functionalities.description: Support for Jakarta RESTful Web Services.

functionalities.name: jpa
functionalities.description: Support for JPA (using the latest WildFly supported Hibernate release).
functionalities.note: This layer must be explicitly excluded if jpa-distributed is in use.

functionalities.name: jsf
functionalities.description: Support for Jakarta Faces.

functionalities.name: jsonb
functionalities.description: Support for JSON Binding (Jakarta JSON Binding) provisioning the Jakarta JSON Binding API and Implementation modules.

functionalities.name: jsonp
functionalities.description: Support for JSON Processing (Jakarta JSON Processing) provisioning the Jakarta JSON Processing API and Implementation modules.

functionalities.name: myfaces
functionalities.description: Support for Jakarta Faces, MyFaces implementation.

functionalities.name: naming
functionalities.description: Support for JNDI

functionalities.name: resource-adapters
functionalities.description: Support for deployment of Jakarta Connectors resource adapters.

functionalities.name: mvc-krazo
functionalities.description: Support for Jakarta MVC

functionalities.name: embedded-activemq
functionalities.description: Support for an embedded Apache Activemq Artemis Jakarta Messaging broker.

functionalities.name: messaging-activemq
functionalities.description: Support for connections to a remote Jakarta Messaging broker

functionalities.name: remote-activemq
functionalities.description: Support for connections to a remote Apache Activemq Artemis Jakarta Messaging broker

functionalities.name: core-tools
functionalities.description: Support for 'jboss-cli', 'add-user' and 'elytron-tool' launch scripts and configuration files

functionalities.name: microprofile-config
functionalities.description: Support for MicroProfile Config

functionalities.name: health
functionalities.description: Support for runtime health checks.
functionalities.note: When using the WildFly cloud feature-pack for cloud deployment, this layer will be automatically provisioned. It is required for POD health check.

functionalities.name: metrics
functionalities.description: Support for base server metrics in Prometheus format.

functionalities.name: microprofile-health
functionalities.description: Support for MicroProfile Health

functionalities.name: microprofile-telemetry
functionalities.description: Support for MicroProfile Telemetry

functionalities.name: observability
functionalities.description: Aggregation of multiple monitoring functionalities

functionalities.name: opentelemetry
functionalities.description: Support for OpenTelemetry

functionalities.name: elytron-oidc-client
functionalities.description: Support for securing deployment with OIDC

functionalities.name: keycloak-client-saml
functionalities.description: Support for securing your Web deployments with the keyloack SAML protocol.
functionalities.note: Not to be used when provisioning for the cloud if you are using the env variables to automatically configure SAML (SSO_URL, SSO_REALM).

functionalities.name: keycloak-client-saml-ejb
functionalities.description: Support for securing your EJB with the keyloack SAML protocol.
functionalities.note: Not to be used when provisioning for the cloud if you are using the env variables to automatically configure SAML (SSO_URL, SSO_REALM).

functionalities.name: keycloak-saml
functionalities.description: Add the keyloack SAML subsystem to the server configuration.

functionalities.name: undertow-https
functionalities.description: Support for securing web access with HTTPS
